arStrings.szText:
For the next {c_number}{s1}{/c} minutes:
{icon:bullet} Every {c_number}10{/c} seconds, your next Core Skill heals you and Nearby allies for {c_number}10%{/c} of their max Health.
{icon:bullet} Restore an additional {c_number}5%{/c} max Health for each Nearby ally, up to {c_number}25%.{/c}
{icon:bullet} Experience gained is increased by {c_number}8%{/c}.
